name: Llama Drama
description: Spit happens.|Larry's llama ran away after a silly argument about the best grass flavor. Help him find his spitting buddy.

text: I just can't believe it! Lulu and I had such a petty squabble!
Please, find her for me. I think she headed towards the clover fields.
completedText: Locate Lulu in the clover fields.

text: *spits* You're here to bring me back, aren't you?
Tell Larry mint-flavored grass is superior, and I might consider it!
Mint, really? I guess I can give it a try...
Bring her back and I'll reward you!
Well, alright, if he's trying mint...

popup.title: Quest completed!
popup.text: @green@Lulu and Larry are reunited, and it feels so good! Enjoy your @crimson@llama-wool@green@ and stay dry with the spit-proof cloak.
